intentSnapshot.primary_goal: Resolve critical payment processing failure affecting 15% of transactions
intentSnapshot.context: Production alert triggered at 10:30 AM during peak shopping hours. Customer complaints escalating on social media.

decisionRationale.reasoning: After eliminating database and network issues, focused on recent deployment changes. Rollback seemed safest approach given customer impact, despite losing new features temporarily.

alternatives_considered.option: Hot-fix the specific bug in production
pros: Faster resolution if bug is simple
cons: High risk of introducing new bugs
alternatives_considered.rejection_reason: Too risky with current system instability and time pressure

cons: May not work if issue is logic-based
alternatives_considered.rejection_reason: Issue appeared to be logic-based, not load-based
Too complex for immediate implementation during incident

what_worked: Clear communication with stakeholders during incident
Quick decision to rollback when other approaches failed
what_didnt_work: Initial focus on database took too long before checking recent deployments
Monitoring alerts didn't clearly indicate the deployment correlation
Team communication was scattered across multiple channels
Rollback process took longer than expected due to dependency issues

lessons_learned.lesson: Always check recent deployments first in production issues, especially during business hours
Improve monitoring to better correlate issues with deployment timelines
Establish single communication channel for incidents to reduce confusion
Test rollback procedures regularly to ensure they work smoothly under pressure
High-stress situations can tunnel vision - having a systematic checklist helps maintain objectivity

recommendations: Create incident communication protocol with designated single channel
Schedule monthly rollback drills during low-traffic periods
Develop incident response checklist with deployment-first approach
Set up automated alerts for unusual transaction patterns post-deployment

emotional_impact.long_term: growth-oriented with increased confidence in incident handling
